description: Try our easy to follow Brown Rice Sushi Bowl With Sprouted Seeds & Pickled Radishes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Brown Rice Sushi Bowl With Sprouted Seeds & Pickled Radishes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cucumber, halved, deseeded, and finely sliced
4 watermelon radishes, washed, trimmed, and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: To make the pickled radishes, whisk together the vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small bowl until the sugar has dissolved. Pack the radishes into a small jar, pour the vinegar mixture over them until completely covered, and seal. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before using. (These will keep in the refrigerator for up to 1 week.)

Place the sprouted brown rice in a medium heavy-based saucepan and cover with 240ml of cold water. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat to a simmer and cook, covered, for 15-20 minutes, until all the water has evaporated and the rice is nearly tender.
Put the vinegar, sugar, and salt in a small saucepan and heat, whisking, until the sugar is just dissolved. Mix the dressing into the rice and let its it, covered, for 5 minutes.
Mix the sprouted pumpkin seeds, sunflower seeds, and sesame seeds into the warm rice. Set aside 1-2 of the seaweed sheets and crumble the rest over the rice. Mix well to combine.
Turn the warm rice mixture into a serving bowl and top it with the cucumber, avocado, and a few slices of the pickled radishes. Crumble the remaining seaweed sheets over the top and serve.
